Package main

Class PartMachine

java.lang.Object
main.PartMachine
public class PartMachine extends Object
Represents a machine that produces car parts.

  • Constructor Details

    • PartMachine

      public PartMachine(int id, main.CarPart p1, int period, double weightError, int chanceOfDefective)
      Constructor for PartMachine.
      Parameters:
      id - the machine ID
      p1 - the initial car part template
      period - the production period
      weightError - the allowed weight error for produced parts
      chanceOfDefective - the chance of a part being defective

    • printConveyorBelt

      public void printConveyorBelt()
      Prints the content of the conveyor belt. The machine is shown as |Machine {id}|. If the is a part it is presented as |P| and an empty space as _.
